      • addPlayer

                      edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Location location)
        Set an actor as the player. The map is drawn just before this Actor's turn
        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        location - the Location where the player is to be added

      • run

        public void run()
        Run the game. On each iteration the game loop does the following: It detects if the player is killed or all the other humans, human and farmer are killed in the map and stop the game. Displaying the player lost. If all the zombies and mambo marie are killed and not in the map, stop and end the game too. Display the player wins the game. The game stops running when the player is removed from map. It display message for player who either quit the game / wins / loses. Else, if none of the above happened, it will process the actions of every Actor in the game, regardless of the map.
        Overrides:
        run in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.World
        See Also:
        run()

      • processActorTurn

        protected void processActorTurn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
        Gives an Actor its turn. The Actions an Actor can take include:
        • those conferred by items it is carrying
        • movement actions for the current location and terrain
        • actions that can be done to Actors in adjacent squares
        • actions that can be done using items in the current location
        • skipping a turn
        Overrides:
        processActorTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.World
        Parameters:
        actor - the Actor whose turn it is.

      • summonMambo

        public java.lang.String summonMambo(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap gameMap)
        Summon the Mambo Marie at the edge of the map. Use random() to randomly select where the Mambo should be summoned in the map.
        Parameters:
        gameMap -
        Returns:

      • stillRunning

        protected boolean stillRunning()
        Returns true if the game is still running. The game is considered to still be running if the player is still around.
        Overrides:
        stillRunning in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.World
        Returns:
        true if the player is still on the map.

      • playerWin
